featured.text: After heated debates and discussions, the government was finally persuaded to consider another 19 effective method: giving the pigeons birth control.

definition.zh_def: 辯論；討論不同意見的過程或活動。
definition.en_def: A formal discussion on a particular topic in a public meeting or legislative assembly, in which opposing arguments are put forward.
definition.example: The students engaged in a lively debate about climate change.
